originalText.text: Brought in tan suede shoes with a dark oil stain that I made even worse with an attempt to clean with dish detergent at home. I had no expectation they’d be cleaned, it seemed impossible. Somehow the stain is almost completely gone.

text.text: Brought in tan suede shoes with a dark oil stain that I made even worse with an attempt to clean with dish detergent at home. I had no expectation they’d be cleaned, it seemed impossible. Somehow the stain is almost completely gone.

originalText.text: Owner did great work changing the straps on my handbag, at what seemed to be a fair price.  I asked him about some sticky residue on my bag and he polished it off with some cream without asking me for money!  They just seem like friendly, honest guys who are proud of their work.

text.text: Owner did great work changing the straps on my handbag, at what seemed to be a fair price.  I asked him about some sticky residue on my bag and he polished it off with some cream without asking me for money!  They just seem like friendly, honest guys who are proud of their work.

originalText.text:
Note: The name is A-Plus, and seems to have been for several years.

Excellent-quality work at fair prices. Two-day turnaround on fairly straightforward work in my case (new heels to replace worn-out ones). It's a cramped space for customers because it makes more sense to use the space for a shoeshine chair and workspace, after all. Many other satisfied customers , from the looks of the steady stream of neighborhood people picking up and dropping off while I collected my shoes. I have no qualms returning the next time I need work done.

originalText.text: I have been coming here for shoe (and watch battery) work for over ten years. And I have no complaints. He knows what I am looking for, and can usually turn around within a day or two (complete with free delivery). So glad to have him in the neighborhood.

text.text: I have been coming here for shoe (and watch battery) work for over ten years. And I have no complaints. He knows what I am looking for, and can usually turn around within a day or two (complete with free delivery). So glad to have him in the neighborhood.

originalText.text: Now called " A Plus Shoe repair " .Javier the Owner is a pro makes my shoes look and feel like new .  I had to go away for a weekend and he had new soles and taps and my blue suede shoes cleaned and ready to go in an hour . Great work, price is right and local shop
